title: IXP Statistics Aggregates Schema
description: A JSON schema representing the aggregated traffic at an IXP

version.title: Schema Version
version.description: Version number of the schema; this is not the version of the file within an IXP; but the schema version

created_at.title: Datetime of export
created_at.description: Datetime (ISO 8601) of when the data was exported

next_update_at.title: Datetime of next export
next_update_at.description: Datetime (ISO 8601) of the next time when the data will be exported

sources.title: Statistic Sources
sources.description: A hash of sources, with ixf_ixid as the key

url.title: URL of the IXP's statistics page
url.description: Url of the IXP's own statistics page

title.title: Title / Display name
title.description: The title or display name of the IXP

aggregate_interval.title: Aggregate Interval
aggregate_interval.description: Width of the aggregate window in seconds.

current_packets_in.description: The current number of packets going in

current_packets_out.description: The current number of packets going out

current_octets_in.description: The current number of octets going in

current_octets_out.description: The current number of octets going out

average_packets_in.description: The average number of packets going in

average_packets_out.description: The average number of packets going out

average_octets_in.description: The average number of octets going in

average_octets_out.description: The average number of octets going out

maximum_packets_in.description: The maximum number of packets going in

maximum_packets_out.description: The maximum number of packets going out

maximum_octets_in.description: The maximum number of octets going in

maximum_octets_out.description: The maximum number of octets going out
